document.full_text: a gulf plan to ease yemeni president ali abdullah saleh out of power has been modified to allow him not sign it as president, the opposition said on friday, a condition that nearly derailed the deal last week.
document.title: yemen deal changed to meet saleh demands: opposition
lines_and_colors: a gulf plan to ease yemeni president ali abdullah saleh out of power has been modified to allow him not sign it as president, the opposition said on friday, a condition that nearly derailed the deal last week.
